channel.title: Finance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Finance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Has Your Gmail Password Been Hacked? Check Now, Here’s How
item.description: Hackers are coming for your Gmail password. Fact. But what if they already have it? Here’s what you need to do to find out.

item.title: You don’t need to have fun at work—take it from NBA head coach Joe Mazzulla: ‘Fun is a cop-out sometimes when things aren’t going well’
item.description: The famously intense Mazzulla was fielding a question about "fun" from a child reporter: "I struggle with that, to be honest with you."

item.description: The holiday images on Apple’s London HQ are always spectacular, projected 330 feet tall on Battersea Power Station. Here’s what they’ll look like.

item.title: Some Social Security recipients to receive 2 monthly benefit checks in December
item.description: SSI recipients will receive two Social Security payments in December 2025 due to a calendar scheduling quirk that moves January's payment to Dec. 31.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
